column5: You'll be living in a newly built home in the wonderful Montrose area. It's in a relatively quiet neighborhood away from the busiest streets, but still very close to parks, restaurants and major employment areas. Less than .5 mi to many restaurants and bars as well as Whole Food grocery store. Just a couple of minutes walk to public transportation serving the Texas Medical Center, Rice University, Downtown, Uptown/Galleria and Upper Kirby.
column8: Bedroom w. private bath in modern Montrose home
